articles.content: Police have identified a man who was arrested after getting on the tarmac and climbing onto the wing of a plane that was preparing to take off from Las Vegas' airport. Alejandro Carlson, 41, remains … [+1227 chars]

articles.author: Joe Pinkstone
articles.title: Remdesivir 'could be beneficial for some patients', doctors reveal - Daily Mail
articles.description: University of Cambridge researchers studied a 31-year-old man with Covid-9 who also has a genetic condition, XLA, which prevents him from making antibodies.
articles.content:
The drug remdesivir, long touted as a potential Covid-19 treatment, has been used to successfully cure a patient who suffered a rare reaction to the disease.
